metadata.title: CVE-2020-8116 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Prototype pollution vulnerability in dot-prop npm package versions before4.2.1 and versions 5.x before 5.1.1 allows an attacker to add arbitraryproperties to JavaScript language constructs such as objects.

criterions.comment: node-dot-prop package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
